alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Montgomery; Telfair; Toombs; Wheeler; Wilcox (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Toombs, southern Dodge, Telfair, southeastern Wilcox, Wheeler and Montgomery Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 715 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near New Branch to near McRae to near Owensboro, and moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... McRae, Lyons, Abbeville, Alamo, Mount Vernon, Vidalia, Helena, Lumber City, Rochelle, Glenwood, Milan, Uvalda, Ailey, Rhine, Scotland, Chauncey, Higgston, Santa Claus, Alston, and Jacksonville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Dodge; Montgomery; Telfair; Toombs; Wheeler; Wilcox
